title: STEM Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program Based on Computational Thinking (CT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and secondary-level mathematical proficiency
context.additional_context: Practice-centered design considering real-world applicability by current professionals, implementing projects utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design logical step-by-step solutions by applying algorithmic thinking processes when solving STEM problems
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in applying computational thinking (CT) elements (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithmization) during project-based assessments
Learners propose at least three meaningful improvement plans in team projects creatively solving complex STEM problems through collaborative learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
